Message:
They had retreated after
the fight, so the commander
killed everyone to cover up
the truth.

and became wanted for
mass murder and treason.

I’ll never forgive you.
I’ll hunt you down.

My heart was overtaken
by hatred and despair.

But then, the chief of
the bandits said to me,

“If you’ve got nowhere to go,
then come along.

We’ll raise you to be
a strong bandit.”

Hearing those words,
I took his hand.
